search:
It's obvious, but I never realized that the main purpose of the unbreakable space ` ` is to avoid split of consecutive words. Just like my family name. So this `De Keyzer` will avoid splitting the `De` on a line and `Keyzer` on the next one.

It's also possible to [generate a UTF8 unbreakable character](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Non-breaking_space#Keyboard_entry_methods) (you don't have to handle a HTML entity). On OS X `Option`+`Space` and on Windows `Alt-Gr`+`0` `1` `6` `0` or  `Alt-Gr`+`2` `5` `5` (but it's not always working).

For instance, it may be usefull to avoid a lost `I` at the end of lignes like this: `I want`.
title: Unbreakable De Keyzer
